Summary: I am writing this because I was just watching your show on witness describing glitter
divs: sighting detailsi was driving home on the northway going south sometime just after midnight in 1976. i remember it was very dark that night and i do not remember seeing a moon. there were colored lights everywhere in a black sky. it reminded me of what the woman tonight on tv was telling mufon about "glitter". the only difference is what i saw were lights of various colors. there did not seem to be any pattern. this went on for a long time. i do remember seeing the lights from a plane that was going to land at albany airport. it started it's decent across the northway and was surrounded by this glitter. i was thinking whatever this is...it's on their radar. i do not remember driving or hearing any noise what so ever. i do know there were some cars in back of me driving very slowly watching in disbelief as i was. suddenly to the left there was a huge ball of light that decended rapidly. i was absolutely shocked at what i was seeing. when i arrived home i immediately called my mother who told me it was on the three available networks...channel 6, 10 and 13 i believe. the next day there was some kind of news blackout because it was treated as if it never happen. all these years i have hoped someone would report seeing what i saw that night. this is the first time i've heard anyone say glitter. that is exactly what it looked like. thank you. sincerely, [cms\tg\pid]
